mapper.select: SELECT t1.id,t1.title,t1.create_time,t2.read_state,t1.type FROM annunciate t1 LEFT JOIN annunciate_item t2 ON t1.id=t2.annunciate_id WHERE 1=1 and t2.read_state!=3 and t2.target_id=#{targetId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by t1.start_time desc

SELECT t1.id,t1.title,t1.start_time,t2.read_state,t1.stick_state FROM annunciate t1 LEFT JOIN annunciate_item t2 ON t1.id=t2.annunciate_id WHERE t1.send_state=2 AND t2.read_state!=3 AND t2.target_id=#{targetType,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY t1.start_time DESC,t1.stick_state DESC LIMIT 0,3
